meanings.definition: To engage in conversation or discussion.
meanings.sent1: We were confabbing about our favorite movies.
meanings.sent2: During lunch, my friends and I enjoy confabbing about our weekend plans.
meanings.sent3: The birds outside seem to be confabbing about the upcoming storm.
meanings.sent4: The leaves on the trees were confabbing with the wind, rustling in agreement.
meanings.sent5: Confabbing with my sister always brings a smile to my face.

meanings.sent1: After the meeting, there was a lively confabbing in the break room.
meanings.sent2: I overheard their confabbing about the new restaurant in town.
meanings.sent3: The confabbing between the two squirrels in the park was quite entertaining.
meanings.sent4: The confabbing of the leaves in the breeze created a soothing background noise.
meanings.sent5: The confabbing of the birds in the morning signaled the start of a new day.
